choices: Edwin wants to try out being a baby again
Edwin wants to give Tommy a chance to be a little older
11112111.content:
Now; why would Edwin conduct such an experiment?

Perhaps Edwin does it because he wants to experience the carefree life of a baby one more time?

Or, maybe it's because he wants to give Tommy a special gift, namely being an older child, for a few days?
11112111.title: An experiment conducted by Edwin

111121112.content: He does this for his little sister's friend how?
111121112.title: Edwin wants to give Tommy a chance to be a litt...

choices: Any other choices you can think of?
11113.content: Who else could Tommy swap bodies with?

1112.title: His changes has something to do with his age

11122.content: Do you really want Tommy to get older, or do you perhaps want him to swap ages with someone?
11122.title: Older, or something else?

111221.content: What age does Tommy progress to?
111221.title: Age Progression

1112211.content: Does he become an older toddler?
1112211.title: Older Toddler/Kid/Pre-Teen (From Age 2 To 12)

11122113.content: Does Tommy become 11 years old like his All Grown Up! counterpart?
11122113.title: A pre-teen.

111221131.content: How does he become 11 years old?
111221131.title: Yes

1112211311.content: The invention in this case is a special type of baby powder?
1112211311.title: One of Stu's Inventions

1112211312.content: Does he wish upon a star?
1112211312.title: Something Else

11122113121.content:
One night, Tommy was tired of being a baby. He wanted to be able to do the things that older children do, like go to school, cross the street by himself, and play big kid games. As he went to bed that night, he saw a shooting star in the night sky.

"I wish I was older. I want to do the things that big kids do." said Tommy, then he fell asleep in his big boy bed. Early the next morning, when he woke up, he was older and taller. He was now eleven years old, and as a result, just barely fit in his big boy bed and his shirt and diaper got tighter. He also had a full head of purple hair.

"My wish came true, I'm a big boy now!" said Tommy in a deeper voice. He covered his mouth upon hearing his voice.

"Is that my voice? I didn't expect it to be so deep." said Tommy.

What happens next?
11122113121.title: Yes

choices: Tommy Decides to Show His Friends His New 11-year-old Form
111221131211.content:
Tommy's amazement was cut short by his urge to pee. Now that he was eleven years old, Tommy knew that he could no longer use his diapers whenever he needed to pee like he did when he was one. Fortunately, now that he was older, he had the knowledge he needed to use the toilet whenever he had to pee, so he decided to do just that. He ran into the bathroom and closed the door. Then, he walked up to the toilet and untaped his diaper, letting it fall to the floor. Once his diaper was off, Tommy started peeing in the toilet. As he peed, he was amazed at how much liquid his new eleven-year-old bladder could hold. He continued to pee until at last, his bladder was empty. When he was all done, he flushed the toilet. Then he picked up his untaped diaper and taped it back onto his bottom. Since he had gotten older, his diaper had gotten a little tighter, so he taped it so it was just loose enough to fit him. After that, he went to the sink to wash his hands.

What happens next?
111221131211.title: Tommy has to pee

1112211312111.content:
Tommy decided to show his friends his new eleven-year-old form.

Who did he show first?
1112211312111.title: Tommy Decides to Show His Friends His New 11-ye...

11122113121111.content: Did he show Chuckie first?
11122113121111.title: Chuckie and/or Kimi

111221131211113.content:
Tommy decided to show Chuckie and Kimi his new eleven-year-old form. He went over to Chuckie's house and saw them playing in the playpen.

"Hi, guys!" said Tommy.

How did Chuckie and Kimi react to seeing Tommy in his new eleven-year-old form?
111221131211113.title: Both of them.

1112211312111131.content: Did Chuckie try to run, not recognizing him?
1112211312111131.title: Shocked

11122113121111311.content:
"Aaaah! It's a giant, and it's wearing Tommy's clothes!" said Chuckie as he tried to run.

Did Kimi recognize Tommy in his new body?
11122113121111311.title: Yeah.

111221131211113111.content: How was she able to recognize him?
111221131211113111.title: Yes

11122113121112.content: Was it Phil and/or Lil?
11122113121112.title: Someone Else

1112211312112.content: Upon seeing his reflection in the mirror, did Tommy decide he needed new clothes more suitable for an eleven-year-old boy?
1112211312112.title: Something Else

11122113121121.content:
As he washed his hands, Tommy looked at his reflection in the mirror, specifically the clothes he was wearing. Tommy realized that now that he was eleven years old, he was well past the normal potty-training age, so he couldn't wear diapers anymore. He also noticed that his shirt had gotten a little small on him. He decided that he needed some new clothes more suited for an eleven-year-old boy.

What does Tommy do?
11122113121121.title: Yes

111221131211211.content:
Tommy suddenly remembered that his friend Susie had an older brother, Buster, who was now around the same age as him. He decided to talk to her to see if he could borrow some of Buster's clothes. Susie lived just across the street from him, and now that he was eleven years old, he was old enough to cross the street all by himself. He soon made his way to Susie's house, where he saw Susie playing with one of her Cynthia dolls.

"Hi, Susie!" Tommy said to Susie.

How did Susie react to seeing the new eleven-year-old Tommy?
111221131211211.title: Go Talk to Susie

1112211312112111.content:
Susie was shocked when she saw that Tommy was eleven years old now.

"Tommy, what happened to you?" she asked.

"Isn't it great, Susie? Last night, I wished to be older on a star, and now I'm eleven years old. I can do all the things that the bigger kids do. I can go to school, I can play big-kid games, and I can cross the street by myself. I even used the toilet by myself this morning." Tommy told Susie.

"Oooh, that's so cool!" said Susie.

"There's just one problem; now that I'm eleven years old, my shirt and my diaper don't fit right anymore. I know you have a big brother who's about the same age as I am now, could I please borrow some of his clothes?" Tommy asked Susie.

Does Susie let Tommy borrow some of Buster's clothes?
1112211312112111.title: Shocked

choices: He did it himself, and his mind caught up with his new body.
11122113121121111.content: They managed to find some, but, did Susie dress him?
11122113121121111.title: Yes

111221131211211112.content:
Since Buster was at school, Susie went into his bedroom. She went through Buster's drawers and pulled out a shirt, pants, socks, and underwear. She lay them on Buster's bed, then she decided to give Tommy some privacy while he dressed himself. Tommy untaped his diaper, then pulled his shirt up over his head and tossed it aside. He then put on Buster's shirt, underwear, pants, and socks.

"Okay, Susie. you can come in now." Tommy told Susie. Susie came in.

"You look great in those clothes, Tommy." said Susie.

"Thanks, Susie." said Tommy. He then picked up his old shirt and diaper and left to go home and put them in the laundry hamper and wastebasket, respectively.

What happens next?
111221131211211112.title: He did it himself, and his mind caught up with ...

1112211312112111121.content: Chuckie and Kimi are next to see the new Tommy?
1112211312112111121.title: Reader's Choice 1

choices: Tommy will become a 14-year old, in both mind and body.
Tommy keeps his 1-year old mind in his new 14-year old body.
111221212.content: Okay; so Tommy will be progressing in age until he is 14 years old, but does his mental age change along with his body, or is it only his physical self that ages up, while his mind remains that of a 1-year old?
111221212.title: 14 years old

1112212121.content: He'll become a 14 year old both physically and mentally, but, how?
1112212121.title: Tommy will become a 14-year old, in both mind a...

111222.content: Who will he swap ages with?
111222.title: Age Swap

1113.content: His change will have something to do with his...
1113.title: Something else

11132.content:
I don't know if anyone else has already thought of this: but what if after all these years Angelica's cold,mean-spirited influence has finally rubbed off on Tommy,changing him from a kind-hearted individual and natural born leader to becoming as mean as she is!

Sound like a good idea?
11132.title: Personality

111322.content: Great idea, but, let's see about some other options here. Tommy soon is influenced by...
111322.title: On second thought.....

1113223.content:
"I don't know about this Tommy,it looks awfully scary up there!" Chuckle,the two years old nervously whispered and he was also,one year old fearless Tommy Pickles' best friend as the two of them were exploring the eerie upstairs attic,as usual Tommy's curiosity got the better of him and he just had to escape from his playpen and drag his scaredy cat friend along with him.

"Nonsense Chuckie,I overheard my mommy and daddy saying this morning that they have some interesting things up there in the atty. It might be a entire mountain filled of toys or candy! Who knows what could be up there? Come on!" As slowly,they climbed the wooden steps as usual all the adults were in the living room,watching TV so the chances of the babies getting caught was very slim!

Finally the moment arrived when both managed to pull open the door to the attic and what a shock it was when the first thing that surprised both kids was how eerie the dark was!

"Tommy,this is very scary! It's too dark up here!" Chuckie whispered as he fumbled around,unable to see.

"No worries Chuckie! Luckily I managed to bring my Raptor night light with me!" As Tommy switched it on.

"There! Now we can see more clearer!" As the attic indeed did have quite a few interesting things from numerous clothes the Pickles wore to a huge old fashioned treasure chest that Tommy upon closer examination,knew had to contain a endless barrage of toys.

" Come on Chuckie! Help me get this chest open!" He ordered.

"Well...I don't know Tommy...." But Chuckie decided to give in and after a while,both managed to pry the heavy chest open but instead of a mountain of toys,there was one of Stu Pickles' creepy earliest inventions that ended up....
1113223.title: Anyone else.

11133.content: Say, here's an idea, what if an invention of his dad's accidentally turns him invisible?
11133.title: More.

choices: He waits and shows his friends the stuff
Take a few sips of it now
111331.content:
"Didi,Come in here! I've done it! I've finally done it!" Stu Pickles cried happily as he beckoned his former school teacher wife into his downstairs work area along with their one year old.

"Yawn...Stu...it's two in the morning! Did what already?" She asked groggy,rubbing her eyes.

"Finally created the perfect formula for getting out those rusty stains on the kitchen sink and around the bathtub! Goodbye store brought spray bottles and toilet cleaners!" As he held up a small bottle of what happened to be a blue like liquid.

"Ohhh..." Moaned the one year old in his mother's arms who thought this strange thing his dad was holding,was sone kind of new type of milk or juice.

"What is that Stu? Another one of your kooky inventions?"

"Kooky inventions? This little baby will change the way we humans spend all hours scrubbing away hard stains on the rug and icky rings around the bathtub Di!" Stu said annoyed.

"Ohh how so?" His wife asked.

"By practically making as if it wasn't even there! This special formula I spent all night creating and mixing in different ingredients for will practically make whatever I spray on,completely invisible Didi as if by magic! You know become something like a actual ghost and be able to move through walls and stuff? Don't believe me? Observe...." As Stu sprayed a ordinary screwdriver with the stuff and right before their eyes,it vanished in thin air!

"What th-Stu...H-How...." Didi was so shocked,she nearly dropped her infant who still looked both bewildered and awed by this purple 'milk' stuff!

"See? I told you! It worked! I already tested it out on a few other things! Yeah they're gone now and I really don't know how last the effects will last but I'm hoping to take this downtown tomorrow to those big wigs in City Hall so I can obtain a business contact so I can start selling this stuff as I already got a wild and crazy...."

"Stu,do you think this stuff's safe for the population? What if someone accidentally eats some or something happens?" Didi nervously asked.

"Nothing bad will happen dear. The worst is that they'll wind up invisible for a few minutes and return to normal...this stuff's 100% safe!"

As the two of them were still talking and planning on heading back upstairs,unknown to them,Tommy managed to get down on the floor and grabbed hold of the spray bottle while his dad wasn't looking and like most things,he hid it away in the depths of his diaper.

"Well come on sport,I'll get you to bed..wait where is it? I just put it here on the table...Ahhh well...I'll look for it tomorrow! Come on Di!" As they headed back upstairs and as they put him back into his crib,Tommy quickly brought out the strange purple milk stuff and opened the cap.

"Wonder why my daddy would make this funny type of milk for when we already have milk in the refrigerator? And why did he sound all excited by this stuff? Something about being like a ghost and able to move through walls? Sounds neat! Maybe I should take a taste of this....." The one year old thought.

But should he wait to show Chuckie and the others or simply try some right now?
111331.title: Yeah, sure.

choices: Chuckie or Kimi, or anyone else.
1113311.content: He soon was able to show it to his friends. Did Phil and Lil drink some first, though?
1113311.title: He waits and shows his friends the stuff

info.brief_description: The characters of Rugrats will transform.
info.description: Bringing this back, once again. Rules. No drugs, no sex. No insulting characters. No unborn or back to the womb. Nothing over the top. All transformations are allowed, save the one above.
